pages.text: A seemingly inconspicuous writing table, treated with Dragon’s Blood Resin, thus giving it a crimson tint. This fancy writing table is used to draw sigils. It also contains a unique 5x5 grid in which to draw them, to allow for a lot of freedom and space when drawing.

pages.title: Sigils
pages.text: Sigils are special symbols created by a witch in order to create certain effects or to protect certain areas. Sigils must be drawn using Dragon’s Blood Resin, though other similar compounds such as dyes may also be required depending on the specific sigil.

Sigils may be applied on blocks to affect entities around it and fade away after a week. It can also be applied on chests and doors made from the wood of a Dragon’s Blood tree, and will apply the sigil to those who interact with it.
Causes a target to regenerate health
Ills a target touching the sigil
Causes rituals to fail for a target for some time
Removes some lesser curses, but not all
Increases the chance of finding better loot in chests for a period of time
Provides a minor strength and resistance buff
Summons spooky ghosts to attack the target
